product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Pico Glo Lantern
long_description: When the power goes out or you're stumbling back to your camp in the dark of night, the Ultimate Survival Technologies PicoTM Glo lantern is simple to find thanks to its glow-in-the-dark housing.
short_description: When the power goes out or you're stumbling back to your camp in the dark of night, the Ultimate Survival Technologies PicoTM Glo lantern is simple to find thanks to its glow-in-the-dark housing.
